generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and cars parked along its sides.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, with a person walking on it.
- building: There are buildings on both sides of the street, including one with a green door and arched windows on the right.
- vegetation: Trees and greenery are visible along the street and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings.
- person: A person is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road.
- pole: A pole with a traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a blue background and a red border, indicating "No Stopping," is visible on the right side of the road.
